inlineContent.text: Note Number (or Note Index if using MIDI 2.0 Pitch 7.9)
For MIDI 1.0, translate velocity of 0 as a Note Off event.

abstract.text: Standard MIDI File extension for MIDIKit.
Channel Voice Message: NRPN (Non-Registered Parameter Number),
also referred to as Assignable Controller in MIDI 2.0.
Channel Voice Message: NRPN (Non-Registered Parameter Number),
also referred to as Assignable Controller in MIDI 2.0.
A 4-bit unsigned integer value type used in
Channel Voice Message: NRPN (Non-Registered Parameter Number),
also referred to as Assignable Controller in MIDI 2.0.
Channel Voice Message: NRPN (Non-Registered Parameter Number),
also referred to as Assignable Controller in MIDI 2.0.

Channel Voice events include notes, continuous controllers, pressure (aftertouch), program changes, and registered parameters (RPN/NRPN). Additional per-note controllers are available when communicating with a device that supports MIDI 2.0.
Channel Voice Message: RPN (Registered Parameter Number),
also referred to as Registered Controller in MIDI 2.0.
Channel Voice Message: RPN (Registered Parameter Number),
also referred to as Registered Controller in MIDI 2.0.
MIDIKit umbrella import that includes all MIDIKit modules.
A 7-bit unsigned integer value type used in
Channel Voice Message: RPN (Registered Parameter Number),
also referred to as Registered Controller in MIDI 2.0.
Essential MIDI types used by all modules in MIDIKit.
Assembles a MIDI 1.0 NRPN compound message, consisting of multiple CC events.
Channel Voice Message: RPN (Registered Parameter Number),
also referred to as Registered Controller in MIDI 2.0.
Assembles a MIDI 1.0 RPN compound message, consisting of multiple CC events.
